summary: Let\'s you upgrade smaller weapons to larger weapons (e.g. sword -> greatsword).
descriptionHtml:
[heading] [color=Yellow] Upgrade Weapons [/color] [/heading]
[b] With this mod you can upgrade smaller weapons to larger ones: [/b]
[i] (I did not include downgrading weapons, but if it\'s requested i will do it.) [/i]
[line]
Dagger [color=green] -> [/color] Sword [color=green] -> [/color] Greatsword
War Axe [color=green] -> [/color] Battleaxe
Mace [color=green] -> [/color] Warhammer
(Bolts [color=green] <-> [/color] Arrows if you have Dawnguard)
[line]
All materials and DLC are supported. (List at the End)
[line]
Should be compatible with everything.
[line]
[heading] [color=red] List of required Materials: [/color] [/heading]
Dagger [color=green] -> [/color] Sword
[list]
[*]1 Dagger of respective Material
[*]1 Ingot of respective Material
[/list]
Sword [color=green] -> [/color] Greatsword
[list]
[*]1 Sword of respective Material
[*]2 Ingots of respective Material
[/list]
War Axe [color=green] -> [/color] Battleaxe
[list]
[*]1 War Axe of respective Material
[*]2 Ingots of respective Material
[*]1 Firewood
[/list]
Mace [color=green] -> [/color] Warhammer
[list]
[*]1 Mace of respective Material
[*]2 Ingots of respective Material
[*]1 Firewood
[/list]
The recipes only show up if you have enough materials.
To Upgrade Weapons the respective Smithing Perk (e.g. Steel Smithing) is needed.
Iron Weapons don\'t require a Perk.
[line]
For Daedric Weapons:
[list]
[*]Ebony Ingots
[*]1 Daedra Blood (10 can be crafted out of one Daedra Heart at the Tanning Rack)
[/list]
For Dragonbone Weapons:
[list]
[*]Firewood is replaced with ebony ingots
[/list]
[line]
Arrows [color=green] -> [/color] Bolts:
[list]
[*]25 Arrows of respective Material
[*]1 Ingot of respective Material
[/list]
Bolts [color=green] -> [/color] Arrows:
[list]
[*]25 Bolts of respective Material
[*]1 Firewood
[/list]
[line]
[heading] [color=red] List of supported Materials: [/color] [/heading]
[b] Skyrim: [/b]
[list]
[*]Iron
[*]Steel
[*]Skyforge Steel
[*]Dwarven
[*]Orcish
[*]Ebony
[*]Daedric
[*]Elven
[*]Glass
[*]Ancient Nord
[*]Nord Hero
[/list]
[b] Dawnguard: [/b]
[list]
[*]Dragonbone
[*]Steel & Dwarven Bolts
[/list]
[b] Dragonborn: [/b]
[list]
[*]Stalhrim
[*]Nordic Carved
[/list]
